bicep_curl.name: Bicep Curl
bicep_curl.description: The classic isolation exercise for biceps using dumbbells or a barbell.

step_by_step.step: Hold weights at your sides with palms facing forward.
step_by_step.tips: Keep elbows close to your torso and avoid swinging the weights.

step_by_step.step: Curl the weights up by bending your elbows.
step_by_step.tips: Focus on squeezing the biceps at the top.

step_by_step.step: Lower slowly back to starting position.
step_by_step.tips: Control the movement to engage the muscle fully.

bench_press.name: Bench Press
bench_press.description: The bench press is a weight training exercise where you lie on a bench and push a barbell or dumbbells upward to strengthen your chest, shoulders, and arms. Variations include incline and decline bench press.

step_by_step.step: Lie flat on a bench with feet on the floor.
step_by_step.tips: Keep your back flat and feet planted for stability.

step_by_step.step: Hold the barbell (or dumbbells) slightly wider than shoulder-width.
step_by_step.tips: Ensure wrists are straight to avoid strain.

step_by_step.step: Lower the weight slowly to your chest.
step_by_step.tips: Control the descent and avoid bouncing the bar off your chest.

step_by_step.step: Push it back up until your arms are straight.
step_by_step.tips: Engage your chest and triceps to lift smoothly.

benefits: Builds chest, shoulder, and tricep strength

calf_raises.name: Calf Raises
calf_raises.description: A bodyweight exercise that strengthens calf muscles.

step_by_step.step: Stand upright, feet hip-width apart.
step_by_step.tips: Keep your posture straight and core engaged.

step_by_step.step: Push through balls of feet to raise heels off the ground.
step_by_step.tips: Rise slowly and fully extend the calves at the top.

step_by_step.step: Lower slowly back down.
step_by_step.tips: Control the descent to maximize muscle engagement.

common_mistakes: Not going through full range of motion

chest_fly.name: Chest Fly
chest_fly.description: The chest fly isolates the chest by opening and closing the arms in a wide arc, similar to a hugging motion. Can be done with dumbbells on a bench or with cables.

step_by_step.step: Lie on a flat bench (or stand between cables) with arms extended, elbows slightly bent.
step_by_step.tips: Maintain a small bend in elbows to protect joints.

step_by_step.step: Slowly open your arms wide to stretch your chest.
step_by_step.tips: Move in a controlled manner; don’t let gravity do the work.

step_by_step.step: Bring your arms back together in front of you, keeping elbows slightly bent.
step_by_step.tips: Focus on squeezing the chest at the top.

deadlift.name: Deadlift
deadlift.description: A compound lift that strengthens the back, glutes, hamstrings, and core.

step_by_step.step: Stand with feet hip-width apart, barbell over mid-foot.
step_by_step.tips: Keep your back straight and chest up.

step_by_step.step: Bend at hips and knees, grip the bar.
step_by_step.tips: Use a strong grip and engage lats.

step_by_step.step: Lift with straight back until standing tall.
step_by_step.tips: Drive through heels and keep bar close to body.

step_by_step.step: Lower with control back to start.
step_by_step.tips: Maintain spine alignment and avoid rounding the back.

diamond_push_up.name: Diamond Push Up
diamond_push_up.description: A push-up variation that emphasizes triceps by placing the hands close together under the chest.

step_by_step.step: Start in plank position with hands forming a diamond under your chest.
step_by_step.tips: Keep hands close together and elbows pointing backward.

step_by_step.step: Lower your body, keeping elbows close to sides.
step_by_step.tips: Go down slowly to maximize tricep engagement.

step_by_step.step: Push back up to starting position.
step_by_step.tips: Keep core tight and body straight throughout.

dips.name: Dips
dips.description: Dips target the triceps, chest, and shoulders using your body weight. Can be done on parallel bars or a bench.

step_by_step.step: Place your hands on parallel bars or the edge of a bench.
step_by_step.tips: Keep shoulders down and chest slightly forward.

step_by_step.step: Lower your body by bending elbows until arms are at 90 degrees.
step_by_step.tips: Control the descent; don’t bounce.

step_by_step.step: Push yourself back up until arms are straight.
step_by_step.tips: Focus on triceps engagement and keep torso upright.

benefits: Can be done anywhere with minimal equipment

face_pull.name: Face Pull
face_pull.description: An exercise that targets rear delts and upper traps, improving posture and shoulder health.

step_by_step.step: Attach a rope to a cable machine at upper chest height.
step_by_step.tips: Grip rope with palms facing each other.

step_by_step.step: Pull the rope toward your face, elbows high.
step_by_step.tips: Focus on squeezing shoulder blades together.

step_by_step.step: Return slowly with control.
step_by_step.tips: Maintain tension on the muscles throughout.

hammer_curl.name: Hammer Curl
hammer_curl.description: Targets both biceps and forearms with a neutral grip.

step_by_step.step: Hold dumbbells at your sides, palms facing inward.
step_by_step.tips: Keep elbows tucked close to torso.

step_by_step.step: Curl the weights upward, keeping palms facing in.
step_by_step.tips: Focus on forearm and bicep contraction.

step_by_step.step: Lower slowly with control.
step_by_step.tips: Avoid swinging weights; maintain slow, steady motion.

lat_pulldown.name: Lat Pulldown
lat_pulldown.description: A machine exercise that targets the lats and upper back, mimicking the pull-up motion.

step_by_step.step: Sit at a lat pulldown machine and grab the bar wider than shoulders.
step_by_step.tips: Keep chest up and shoulders back.

step_by_step.step: Pull the bar down to your chest, squeezing the lats.
step_by_step.tips: Focus on engaging back muscles, not arms.

step_by_step.step: Slowly return the bar overhead.
step_by_step.tips: Control the movement and avoid leaning back excessively.

lateral_raises.name: Lateral Raises
lateral_raises.description: An isolation exercise that targets the side delts, helping build wider shoulders. Usually performed with dumbbells.

step_by_step.step: Hold a dumbbell in each hand at your sides, palms facing inward.
step_by_step.tips: Keep a slight bend in your elbows and core engaged.

step_by_step.step: Slightly lean forward at the hips, keeping back straight.
step_by_step.tips: Maintain spine alignment and avoid arching.

step_by_step.step: Raise arms out to the sides until shoulder height.
step_by_step.tips: Lift with control, avoid momentum.

step_by_step.step: Lower slowly with control.
step_by_step.tips: Focus on engaging the side delts throughout.

benefits: Builds side delts for wider shoulders
common_mistakes: Raising too high or too low

leg_curl.name: Leg Curl
leg_curl.description: An isolation exercise for the hamstrings, usually done on a machine.

step_by_step.step: Lie face down on a leg curl machine.
step_by_step.tips: Adjust pads so they sit just above your heels.

step_by_step.step: Hook ankles under the pads.
step_by_step.tips: Keep hips pressed against the bench.

step_by_step.step: Curl your legs upward toward glutes.
step_by_step.tips: Control the movement and squeeze hamstrings at top.

step_by_step.step: Lower slowly with control.
step_by_step.tips: Avoid letting the weights drop.

leg_extension.name: Leg Extension
leg_extension.description: An isolation machine exercise targeting the quadriceps.

step_by_step.step: Sit at a leg extension machine with pads on your shins.
step_by_step.tips: Adjust seat so knees align with machine axis.

step_by_step.step: Extend legs fully, squeezing the quads.
step_by_step.tips: Move slowly and controlled.

step_by_step.step: Lower slowly back down.
step_by_step.tips: Maintain tension; avoid letting weight drop.

lunge.name: Lunge
lunge.description: Targets quads and glutes, improving balance and unilateral strength.

step_by_step.step: Step forward with one leg.
step_by_step.tips: Keep chest upright and core engaged.

step_by_step.step: Lower until both knees are at 90 degrees.
step_by_step.tips: Front knee should stay above ankle, not go past toes.

step_by_step.step: Push back up to standing.
step_by_step.tips: Drive through the heel of the front foot.

step_by_step.step: Alternate legs.
step_by_step.tips: Maintain balance and control throughout.

overhead_press.name: Overhead Press
overhead_press.description: The overhead press mainly targets the shoulders and can be done standing or seated, with dumbbells or a barbell.

step_by_step.step: Hold a barbell or dumbbells at shoulder height with palms facing forward.
step_by_step.tips: Keep core tight and spine neutral.

step_by_step.step: Press the weight upward until arms are fully extended overhead.
step_by_step.tips: Lead with elbows slightly forward, not flared out.

step_by_step.step: Slowly lower it back to shoulder height.
step_by_step.tips: Control the descent to protect shoulder joints.

overhead_triceps_extension.name: Overhead Triceps Extension
overhead_triceps_extension.description: An isolation exercise for the triceps, usually done with a dumbbell or cable.

step_by_step.step: Hold a dumbbell with both hands and raise it overhead.
step_by_step.tips: Keep elbows close to your head.

step_by_step.step: Lower the dumbbell behind your head by bending elbows.
step_by_step.tips: Move slowly and control the weight.

step_by_step.step: Press back up to full extension.
step_by_step.tips: Focus on triceps contraction, avoid flaring elbows.

preacher_curl.name: Preacher Curl
preacher_curl.description: Biceps isolation exercise using a preacher bench and barbell or dumbbells.

step_by_step.step: Sit at a preacher bench with arms extended over the pad.
step_by_step.tips: Keep back straight and chest against pad.

step_by_step.step: Curl the barbell or dumbbell up towards your shoulders.
step_by_step.tips: Focus on slow, controlled movement.

step_by_step.step: Lower back down slowly with control.
step_by_step.tips: Avoid letting the weights drop quickly.

pull_up.name: Pull Up
pull_up.description: A bodyweight exercise that strengthens the lats, upper back, and biceps.

step_by_step.step: Hang from a bar with palms facing away (shoulder-width).
step_by_step.tips: Engage shoulders and core.

step_by_step.step: Pull yourself up until your chin clears the bar.
step_by_step.tips: Focus on squeezing lats and keeping elbows close.

step_by_step.step: Lower slowly with control.
step_by_step.tips: Avoid dropping quickly; maintain tension.

push_up.name: Push Up
push_up.description: The push-up is a bodyweight exercise that works the chest, shoulders, and triceps. It needs no equipment and can be done anywhere, with variations like incline, decline, diamond and more.

step_by_step.step: Start in a plank position with hands under your shoulders.
step_by_step.tips: Engage core and keep body straight.

step_by_step.step: Bend elbows to lower your chest toward the floor.
step_by_step.tips: Lower slowly and controlled.

step_by_step.step: Push through your palms to return to the starting position.
step_by_step.tips: Keep core tight, avoid sagging hips.

rear_delt_fly.name: Rear Delt Fly
rear_delt_fly.description: Targets the rear deltoids, improving shoulder balance and posture. Can be done with dumbbells or cables.

step_by_step.step: Hold a dumbbell in each hand, hinge forward at hips, back straight.
step_by_step.tips: Maintain a slight bend in elbows.

step_by_step.step: Let your arms hang down with slight elbow bend.
step_by_step.tips: Relax shoulders, avoid shrugging.

step_by_step.step: Raise arms out to the sides until at shoulder level.
step_by_step.tips: Move slowly, squeeze shoulder blades.

step_by_step.step: Lower slowly with control.
step_by_step.tips: Maintain tension on rear delts throughout.

shrugs.name: Shrugs
shrugs.description: Isolation move for the traps and upper shoulders, usually performed with dumbbells or a barbell.

step_by_step.step: Hold dumbbells at your sides, arms straight.
step_by_step.tips: Keep neck relaxed and core engaged.

step_by_step.step: Lift (shrug) your shoulders as high as possible.
step_by_step.tips: Pause at the top and squeeze traps.

step_by_step.step: Lower slowly back down.
step_by_step.tips: Avoid dropping weights; maintain control.

squat.name: Squat
squat.description: A fundamental lower body exercise that strengthens quads, glutes, and core.

step_by_step.step: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
step_by_step.tips: Keep chest up and core engaged.

step_by_step.step: Bend knees and hips to lower into a squat, chest upright.
step_by_step.tips: Knees should track over toes.

step_by_step.step: Push back up through heels to standing.
step_by_step.tips: Engage glutes and maintain posture.

weighted_calf_raises.name: Weighted Calf Raises
weighted_calf_raises.description: Calf raises with added weight, usually dumbbells or a barbell.

step_by_step.step: Hold dumbbells at your sides or a barbell on your shoulders.
step_by_step.tips: Keep spine neutral and core engaged.

step_by_step.step: Raise heels off the ground by pushing through the balls of your feet.
step_by_step.tips: Lift slowly and fully extend calves at top.

step_by_step.step: Lower slowly back down.
step_by_step.tips: Control the descent to maximize muscle activation.

hip_extension.name: Hip Extension
hip_extension.description: Targets hamstrings and glutes through hip hinge movements.

step_by_step.step: Stand tall and hinge forward at the hips, keeping back straight.
step_by_step.tips: Engage core and avoid rounding back.

step_by_step.step: Extend hips back up to standing.
step_by_step.tips: Squeeze glutes at the top.

step_by_step.step: Can be weighted with a barbell (Romanian deadlift).
step_by_step.tips: Use moderate weight and controlled movement.

hip_thrust.name: Hip Thrust
hip_thrust.description: Targets the glutes directly, often weighted with a barbell.

step_by_step.step: Sit with your upper back against a bench, feet flat on the floor.
step_by_step.tips: Keep chin tucked and core engaged.

step_by_step.step: Place a barbell across your hips (optional).
step_by_step.tips: Ensure even weight distribution.

step_by_step.step: Drive hips upward until thighs are parallel to the floor.
step_by_step.tips: Squeeze glutes at the top.

step_by_step.step: Lower back down with control.
step_by_step.tips: Avoid letting hips drop quickly.
